Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: People are calling for increased JobSeeker payments amidst growing concerns over poverty and financial hardship in Australia. Meanwhile there are concerns over the potential long-term impacts of central banks' policy decisions worldwide in response to the pandemic. These economic challenges come alongside life-threatening situations such as the recent rescue of fishermen stranded for days without food or water off the coast of Western Australia. As the Government prepares to deliver its federal budget citizens are watching closely to see how it will navigate these complex issues.
